column3: CIB boss for Switzerland LONDON
column4: March 27 (IFR) - Citigroup has promoted Kristine Braden to the position of chief country officer and corporate and investment banking head for Switzerland. She will take up the role on April 1.

column2: UPDATE 1-U.S. regulator proposes letting Delta keep contested Tokyo airport slot March 27 A U.S. regulator tentatively said Friday that Delta Air Lines Inc can keep a slot at Tokyo's Haneda Airport if it flies there from Seattle daily
